metadata.reset:
Use this procedure only in the event that the primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable.

Press and hold the Action Button on Z-Stick for 20 seconds and then release

metadata.inclusion: Turn the primary controller of Z-Wave network into inclusion mode, quickly press key S1 or B-button on product's housing three times
metadata.exclusion: Turn the primary controller of Z-Wave network into exclusion mode, quickly press key S1 or B-button on product's housing three times
metadata.reset:
1. Power-cycle the device
2. Press and hold the B-button to enter the menu
3. Wait for the LED to turn yellow
4. Quickly release and click B-button again
5. Device will restart and LED will turn red

metadata.description: The lower the value, the more sensitive the PIR sensor.
metadata.label: Motion Sensor's Sensitivity

metadata.description: Period of time through which the PIR sensor is ‚Äúblind‚Äù.
metadata.label: Motion Sensor's Blind Time (Insensitive)

metadata.description: Sets the number of moves required for the PIR sensor to report motion.
metadata.label: PIR Sensor‚Äôs ‚ÄúPULSE COUNTER‚Äù

metadata.description: The higher the value, the more sensitive the PIR sensor.
metadata.label: PIR Sensor‚Äôs ‚ÄúWINDOW TIME‚Äù

metadata.description: Period of time after wich Motion alarm will be cancelled.
metadata.label: Motion Alarm Cancellation Delay

metadata.description: The parameter determines the part of day in which the PIR sensor will be active.
metadata.label: Motion detection - operating mode

states.1: PIR sensor active during the day only
states.2: PIR sensor active during the night only

metadata.description: The parameter defines the difference between night and day.
metadata.label: Night / Day

metadata.description: Determines the command frames sent in 1st association group.
metadata.label: BASIC command class configuration

metadata.description: The value of 255 allows to turn ON a device.
metadata.label: BASIC ON command frame value

metadata.description: The value of 0 allows to turn OFF a device.
metadata.label: BASIC OFF command frame value

metadata.description: The parameter determines the changes in forces.
metadata.label: Tamper Sensitivity

metadata.description: Time period after which a tamper alarm will be cancelled.
metadata.label: Tamper - alarm cancellation delay

metadata.description: The parameter determines the behaviour of tamper and how it reports.
metadata.label: Tamper Operating Modes

states.2: Tamper/No cancellation plus Orientation in space

metadata.description: Alarm frame will or will not be sent in broadcast mode.
metadata.label: Tamper Alarm Broadcast Mode

states.0: Tamper alarm is not sent in broadcast mode.
states.1: Tamper alarm sent in broadcast mode.

metadata.description: Change in level of light intensity resulting in illumination report.
metadata.label: Illumination Report Threshold

metadata.description: Time interval between consecutive illumination reports.
metadata.label: Illumination Reports Interval

metadata.description: Change in level of temperature resulting in temperature report.
metadata.label: Temperature Report Threshold

metadata.description: The parameter determines how often the temperature will be measured.
metadata.label: Interval of Temperature Measuring

metadata.description: How often temperature reports will be sent to the main controller.
metadata.label: Temperature Reports Interval

metadata.description: The value to be added to the actual measured temperature.
metadata.label: Temperature Offset

metadata.description: Way in which LED diode behaves after motion has been detected.
metadata.label: LED Signalling Mode

states.1: LED colour depends on the temperature.
states.2: Flashlight mode - LED glows white 10 seconds
states.10: LED colour depends on the temperature
states.19: LED colour depends on the temperature

metadata.description: The parameter determines the brightness of LED when indicating motion.
metadata.label: LED Brightness

metadata.description: Below which LED brightness is set to 1%
metadata.label: Lower Ambient Illumination Level

metadata.description: Above which LED brightness is set to 100%
metadata.label: Upper Ambient Illumination Level

metadata.description: Indicating mode resembles a police car (white, red and blue).
metadata.label: LED indicating Tamper Alarm

states.0: LED does not indicate tamper alarm.

metadata.label: General Purpose state
